background: A cell phone company is building rural and urban factories to produce phones.
constraints: The number of rural factories is an integer
The number of urban factories is an integer
The number of rural factories is non-negative
The number of urban factories is non-negative
Total managers used by rural and urban factories cannot exceed TotalMgrs
Total phones produced by rural and urban factories must be at least MinPhones per day
objective: Minimize the total number of factories
description: A cell phone company is building rural and urban factories. A rural factory can make \var{ProdRural} phones per day and requires \var{MgrsRural} managers. An urban factory can make \var{ProdUrban} phones per day and requires \var{MgrsUrban} managers. The company has available \var{TotalMgrs} managers and must make at least \var{MinPhones} phones per day. How many of each factory type should be built to minimize the total number of factories?

parameters.definition: Phone production per day by a rural factory
Phone production per day by an urban factory
Minimum required phone production per day
